page.title: 03CANAL IN MARSDEN
page.content: { In the canals are lots of old tyres and pieces of bike frames.Now they are cleaning all the mud out of the canal.Some workmen fromthe Manpower Services and from the British Waterways Board have come to make the canal usable again. There is a lot of rubbish in the canal.Before they could clean it out the canal had to be drained. They have been making new gates for the locks.There has been a lot of mud on the side of the canal. We have a barge called Stan that gives rides to people.The men are working between Warehouse Hill and West Slaithwaite.It is too dangerous to go in Standedge tunnel now.The roof is falling in. {Dean Singleton June l985
